title: COVID-19 Pandemic: Are There Unique Cutaneous Manifestations in Patients Infected With SARS-CoV-2?
text: COVID-19 Pandemic: Are There Unique Cutaneous Manifestations in Patients Infected With SARS-CoV-2?

similar.title: COVID-19 and Cutaneous manifestations.
text: We found that the article on "Cutaneous manifestations in COVID-19: a first perspective" is very interesting [1]. Recalcati noted that 20.4 % of the patients have cutaneous problem and mentioned that this is the first report on this clinical aspect of COVID-19.
